Desc.entry: A group for people with an interest in Vespa and Lambretta scooters, the scene that has grown up around them, the music and the fashion. Has both riding and non-riding members, holds regular weekly meetings and attends various events and rallys around the country. Arranges regular charity events and works with Sheffield Combined Scooter Club to organise the sheffield rally "Hammered in Sheffield" which is held every July. The club is relatively new with membership growing evey week, any one is welcome and there is just one rule "Keep it Happy!".
